attributes.action: make St George's Day an official Bank Holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not disgraceful or shameful to celebrate one's nationality. It does not make one a racist either. St Georges Day should be celebrated by everyone as a way of marking and acknowledging our culture and way of life. Celebrating this day will not alienate us from other cultures but allow us to engage other cultures. Bring back national pride!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
